XBPS Package Manager

Package Repositories

  • List installed repositories: 

    $ xbps-query -L

  • Install additional repositories and update system: 

    # xbps-install void-repo-nonfree void-repo-multilib void-repo-multilib-nonfree [void-repo-debug]
# xbps-install -Su xbps && xbps-install -Su

Install, Update And Remove

  • Whole system update: 

    # xbps-install -Su xbps && xbps-install -Su && rm -rf /var/cache/xbps/*

  • Install package: 

    # xbps-install <PACKAGE>

  • Remove package with unused dependencies and orphaned dependencies: 

    # xbps-remove -Ro <PACAKGE>

Package Holding

  • Hold/unhold package: 

    # xbps-pkgdb -m <hold|unhold> <PACKAGE>

Query

Installed Packages

  • List all installed packages: 

    $ xbps-query -l

  • List manually (non-dependency) installed packages: 

    $ xbps-query -m

  • List orphaned installed packages: 

    $ xbps-query -O

  • List on hold packages: 

    $ xbps-query -H

  • Find matching [remote] packages: 

    $ xbps-query [-R] -s <WILDCARD_STRING>

Package Details

  • Show detailed info about given [remote] package: 

    $ xbps-query [-R] -S <PACKAGE>

  • Show package(s) that own(s) given [remote] file: 

    $ xbps-query [-R] -o <WILDCARD_STRING>

  • Show files owned by given [remote] package: 

    $ xbps-query [-R] -f <PACKAGE>

  • Show dependencies for given [remote] package: 

    $ xbps-query [-R] -x <PACKAGE>

  • Show [remote] packages that depends on given package: 

    $ xbps-query [-R] -X <PACKAGE>
